Method Detail

getEntry

java.util.Map.Entry<K,V> getEntry(java.lang.Object key)
Get entry for the specified key. This method can be used to obtains both key and value. It is needed when key is persistent object.

Parameters:
key - searched key
Returns:
entry associated with this key or null if there is no such key in the map

select

java.util.Iterator<V> select(java.lang.Class cls,
                             java.lang.String predicate)
Select values of the map using search predicate This iterator doesn't support remove() method.

Parameters:
cls - class of index members
predicate - JSQL condition
Returns:
iterator through members of the collection matching search condition
